summary: Completed frontend testing of Report Builder Text/Notes Block feature. All 10 features tested successfully: Login works, Report Builder page loads, Text/Notes block can be added via Add Section panel, editable title field works, editable content textarea works, move up/down buttons reorder sections, delete button removes sections, Preview mode shows clean output without edit controls, theme selector changes report colors, Export PDF generates multi-page PDF.

frontend: Login with test@dataviz.com / test123 works
Report Builder page loads with data-testid='report-builder-page'
Add Section panel visible at bottom of report canvas
Text/Notes button (data-testid='add-text_block-btn') visible in Add Section panel
Clicking Text/Notes button adds new text_block section
Text block shows editable title input (data-testid='section-title-input-{index}')
Title input allows editing section title
Text block shows editable content textarea (data-testid='section-content-{index}')
Content textarea allows entering notes/comments
Move Up button (data-testid='move-up-{index}') moves section up
Move Down button (data-testid='move-down-{index}') moves section down
Delete button (data-testid='delete-section-{index}') removes section
Section count decreases after delete
Preview button (data-testid='preview-btn') toggles to Preview mode
Preview mode hides all edit controls (title inputs, textareas, move/delete buttons, Add Section panel)
Preview mode shows text block content as plain text
Edit Mode button toggles back to edit mode with all controls restored
Theme selector (data-testid='theme-selector') opens dropdown with 6 preset themes
Selecting different theme (Purple & Teal) changes report colors
Export PDF button (data-testid='export-btn') triggers PDF export
Export PDF completes successfully with toast notification 'Report exported successfully! (2 pages)'

context_for_next_testing_agent: Text/Notes block feature in Report Builder is fully functional. Key test IDs: add-text_block-btn (to add new text block), section-title-input-{index} (editable title for text_block type), section-content-{index} (editable textarea), move-up-{index}, move-down-{index}, delete-section-{index}, preview-btn, theme-selector, export-btn. The text_block type is handled in same case as 'intro' and 'conclusion' in renderContent() function at line 277 of ReportBuilderPage.jsx.

text_notes_block.entry_point: Add Section panel at bottom of report canvas
features_verified: Add Text/Notes block via button click
Editable title field for custom section names
